Best Beginnings
“He’s latched on straight away and he’s happy, so I’m happy…
It’s amazing they know what to do straight away.” Maria
“It’s a great feeling to be able to do that, 
to provide for him, without anything else. 
Just me, myself. Hopefully I’ll be able to do 
that for months and months to come. That’s my 
target, anyway.” Angela
“At the start I thought that nobody breastfeeds in public
